tag_list: digital-marketing, advertising, display, mobile-marketing, dubai, middleeast, india, delhi, webchutney, omnicom, omd, phd, pepsi, internet
overview:
Jassim is a digital marketer junctioning the intersection of technology and marketing since 1999 as an entrepreneur, advertising guy, and now as the startup specialist for Omnicom Media Group, largest media and marketing services company in the Middle East and North Africa.

He has set up and managed digital marketing agencies across media buying and planning, social media, search advertising, performance marketing and mobile marketing.
